nodes.text: Synthflesh or syntheflesh was a translucent synthetic gel that bonded real flesh and increased healing until repairs could be made. Derived from bacta, synthflesh resulted in scarless tissue once the healing process was complete and the gel flaked off. Synthflesh was also used to describe the synthetic flesh used on synthdroids. It was very similar to synthskin.
Synthflesh was synthetic supply material found in first-aid kits and other medical pack, such as medpacs. It was also used to cover prosthetics like Repli-Limb Prosthetic Replacements.
